Description: Painted plaster portrait-head of bearded man; inlaid glass eyes; painted vignette of mummy at back of neck; proper left ear chipped.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 175 [135].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
